scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of photocopies of ca. 159 letters from four Hemingway correspondents whose papers are in the University of Virginia Library: John Dos Passos, Katharine F. Smith Dos Passos, William Faulkner, and A.E. Hotchner.
Letters by William Faulkner in this collection are listed below.
